allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: complete platform implementation with billing, notifications, and security

Major additions:
- Billing/Entitlements: Stripe integration with checkout, portal, webhooks, usage tracking
- Notifications: Email service with Resend, templating, user preferences, multi-channel
- Analytics: Metrics ingestion, aggregation, learning insights
- AI: Content generation, orchestrator, prompt registry
- Security: Helmet headers, CORS config, rate limiting, encryption
- Social: OAuth flows for Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, TikTok
- Media: S3 uploads, image processing
- Queue: BullMQ job processing, scheduled tasks
- Compliance: Content moderation, GDPR tools
- Tests: Jest unit tests for core services
- CI: GitHub Actions workflow

Also includes:
- OWNER-HANDOFF.md with all required environment variables
- Updated Prisma schema with all models
- Web app pages and components
